intro.title: Calculate Your USA Salary After Taxes
intro.description: Get accurate take-home pay calculations for US salaries. Our calculator includes federal income tax, state taxes, FICA contributions, and standard deductions.

faqs.question: How is US salary tax calculated?
faqs.answer: US salary taxes include federal income tax (progressive brackets), state income tax (varies by state), and FICA taxes. We calculate all three for accurate take-home pay.

faqs.question: What's the difference between federal and state taxes?
faqs.answer: Federal taxes are the same nationwide but vary by income bracket. State taxes vary significantly - Texas has 0% while California has 13.3%.

faqs.question: Are FICA taxes included?
faqs.answer: Yes, we include Social Security (6.2%) and Medicare (1.45%) taxes, totaling 7.65% for most employees.

faqs.question: How often are tax rates updated?
faqs.answer: We update calculations annually based on the latest IRS tax brackets and rates. Current calculations use 2024 tax information.
